children.subject: Those are generally released around the first week of the fall semester
When do we apply for AI positions for Fall 2021?

history.content:
Hello everyone!

We’re looking for students at UC Berkeley who are passionate about data science to be Academic Interns for Data 8 and Data 100 for Summer 2021! If you are interested and have taken Data 8 and/or Data 100 and received a B or better (or a P for all semesters in 2020 or Spring 2021), please consider applying.

Serving as an Academic Intern is a great way to help current students achieve mastery and have a good experience in Data 8 and Data 100. It is also a great way to prepare for becoming a tutor or UGSI in the future!

RESPONSIBILITIES
All Academic Interns enroll in a mandatory 1-unit P/NP class offered by the course faculty. This corresponds to five hours of time commitment per week.

For Data 8, the typical breakdown of the 5 hours is:
- 1 hour of preparation (e.g. studying the week’s assignments, consulting with senior staff, etc.)
- 3 hours of assisting students (1.5 hours twice a week)
- 1 hour for pedagogy practice, (U)GSI check-ins, AI meetings, etc

For Data 100, the breakdown is:
- 4 hours of assisting students (1 hour, 4 times a week)
- 1 hour for preparation, and occasional meetings (orientation, check-ins, etc.)

APPLICATION DEADLINE: Sunday, 6/20 at 11:59pm PDT


If you have any questions, feel free to send them to jacquelinekyu@berkeley.edu (for Data 8) and rkunani@berkeley.edu (for Data 100).

Here is the link: https://forms.gle/njVZx4kDYUt4Wf6v5

Please note that the Academic Intern application is for both Data 8 and Data 100, but you can choose which course(s) you want to apply to.
